channel.title: Tils on emre.xyz | thought of delirehberi
channel.description: Recent content in Tils on emre.xyz | thought of delirehberi

item.description: There is tool named bgrem for using image models to remove backgrounds pipenv shell pipenv install bgrem[cli] bgrem i file.jpg output-file.jpg i argument for specifing input file s argument runs a server and web-ui on port 5000 to use models. First usage of model requires download. So it will take a little bit time to complete at first run of model.
To create custom content types just create a new folder inside content folder. Started Today I Learned contents.
